section.title: measureGraph()

para.computeroutput: std::vector< int > measureGraph (Qureg qureg, const undirectedGraph & graph, std::vector< qreal > qubitAngles, int numRows)

para.para: Measures qubits in a graph-based quantum state.

section.para: This function measures qubits in a graph-based quantum state represented by the provided qureg and graph. The qubit measurement outcomes are stored in the measuredQubitsOutcomes vector.

entry.para: The quantum register representing the quantum state.
The undirected graph representing the connectivity of qubits.
A vector containing the angles for qubit rotations.
The number of rows in the graph layout.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: A vector containing the outcomes of qubit measurements.

section.title: printResultsToScreen()

para.computeroutput: void printResultsToScreen (std::vector< int > measuredQubitsOutcomes, int numRows, int numCols)

para.para: Prints the measurement results to the screen.

section.para: This function prints the measurement results to the screen, including the measured qubit outcomes and the outcome lattice.

entry.para: A vector containing the outcomes of qubit measurements.
The number of rows in the outcome lattice.
The number of columns in the outcome lattice.

section.title: returnMeasQubitOutcomesLattice()

para.computeroutput: std::vector< std::vector< int > > returnMeasQubitOutcomesLattice (std::vector< int > measOutcomes, int numRows, int numCols)

para.para: Constructs a lattice representation of qubit measurement outcomes.

section.para: This function constructs a lattice representation of qubit measurement outcomes based on the provided measOutcomes vector, number of rows (numRows), and number of columns (numCols).

entry.para: A vector containing the outcomes of qubit measurements.
The number of rows in the lattice.
The number of columns in the lattice.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: A two-dimensional vector representing the lattice with qubit measurement outcomes.

formalpara.title: Precondition
formalpara.para: measOutcomes must contain numRows * numCols elements.
